item.description:
Meet for lunch @ Pho Hoa (17 Beach St) in Chinatown @ 11:45 am. Afterwards we will take the MBTA over to MFA.

See the brand new "Arts of the Americas Wing" together. Then free to explore the rest of the museum until your legs give out or museum closing at 4:45 pm. This RSVP is for both lunch and MFA unless you indicate otherwise.

Parking - you may be able to find parking on the streets. Since it is a holiday it will be free parking.

MFA
465 Huntington Ave
Boston, MA
(on the E line of the T)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Museum of Fine Arts on MLK Day (Free Admissions)
